statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeContactInfo;
SELECT full_name, email FROM EmployeeContactInfo;
SELECT phone_number, full_name FROM EmployeeContactInfo;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContactInfo WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT full_name FROM EmployeeContactInfo WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContactInfo WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT full_name, email FROM EmployeeContactInfo WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, phone_number FROM EmployeeContactInfo ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContactInfo WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' OR phone_number LIKE '666%';
SELECT full_name FROM EmployeeContactInfo WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' AND email NOT LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, job_title FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, job_title FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY date, start_time;
SELECT schedule_id, employees.first_name, employees.last_name, date, start_time, end_time, location FROM schedules JOIN employees ON schedules.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, job_title FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContacts;
SELECT full_name, email FROM EmployeeContacts ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, email FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WorkSchedules WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, message, communication_date FROM RemoteCommunication ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM EmployeeContacts;
SELECT * FROM WorkSchedules ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RemoteCommunication WHERE communication_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY communication_time DESC;
SELECT ec.full_name, rc.message FROM EmployeeContacts ec JOIN RemoteCommunication rc ON ec.employee_id = rc.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments;
SELECT location_id, address, city, state FROM locations WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE employee_id = 2 AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT department_name, count(*) as total_employees FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time > '08:00:00' AND end_time < '17:00:00';
SELECT department_name, location_id FROM departments WHERE location_id IN (SELECT distinct location_id FROM locations WHERE state = 'California');
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM employees WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT city, postal_code FROM addresses ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_schedule WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM employees WHERE id = 2;
SELECT address_line, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM work_schedule WHERE employee_id = 4 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, manager_id FROM departments ORDER BY name DESC;
